017package org.apache.juneau.serializer;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.nio.charset.*;
024import java.util.*;
025import java.util.function.*;
026
027import org.apache.juneau.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
032
033/**
034 * Subclass of {@link SerializerSession} for character-based serializers.
035 *
036 * <h5 class='topic'>Description</h5>
037 *
038 * This class is typically the parent class of all character-based serializers.
039 * <br>It has 1 abstract method to implement...
040 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
041 *    <li>
042 *       {@link #doSerialize(SerializerPipe, Object)}
043 * </ul>
044 *
045 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
046 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
047 * </ul>
048 *
049 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
050 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SerializersAndParsers">Serializers and Parsers</a>
051 * </ul>
052 */
053public class WriterSerializerSession extends SerializerSession {
054
055   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056   // Static
057   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
058
059   /**
060    * Creates a new builder for this object.
061    *
062    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
063    * @return A new builder.
064    */
065   public static Builder create(WriterSerializer ctx) {
066      return new Builder(ctx);
067   }
068
069   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
070   // Builder
071   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
072
073   /**
074    * Builder class.
075    */
076   @FluentSetters
077   public static class Builder extends SerializerSession.Builder {
078
079      WriterSerializer ctx;
080      boolean useWhitespace;
081      Charset fileCharset, streamCharset;
082
083      /**
084       * Constructor
085       *
086       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
087       */
088      protected Builder(WriterSerializer ctx) {
089         super(ctx);
090         this.ctx = ctx;
091         useWhitespace = ctx.useWhitespace;
092         fileCharset = ctx.fileCharset;
093         streamCharset = ctx.streamCharset;
094      }
095
096      @Override
097      public WriterSerializerSession build() {
098         return new WriterSerializerSession(this);
099      }
100
101      /**
102       * File charset.
103       *
104       * <p>
105       * The character set to use for writing Files to the file system.
106       *
107       * <p>
108       * Used when passing in files to {@link Serializer#serialize(Object, Object)}.
109       *
110       * <p>
111       * If not specified, defaults to the JVM system default charset.
112       *
113       * @param value
114       *    The new property value.
115       *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
116       * @return This object.
117       */
118      @FluentSetter
119      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {
120         if (value != null)
121            fileCharset = value;
122         return this;
123      }
124
125      /**
126       * Output stream charset.
127       *
128       * <p>
129       * The character set to use when writing to OutputStreams.
130       *
131       * <p>
132       * Used when passing in output streams and byte arrays to {@link WriterSerializer#serialize(Object, Object)}.
133       *
134       * <p>
135       * If not specified, defaults to UTF-8.
136       *
137       * @param value
138       *    The new property value.
139       *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
140       * @return This object.
141       */
142      @FluentSetter
143      public Builder streamCharset(Charset value) {
144         if (value != null)
145            streamCharset = value;
146         return this;
147      }
148
149      /**
150       * Use whitespace.
151       *
152       * <p>
153       * If true, whitespace is added to the output to improve readability.
154       *
155       * @param value
156       *    The new property value.
157       *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
158       * @return This object.
159       */
160      @FluentSetter
161      public Builder useWhitespace(Boolean value) {
162         if (value != null)
163            useWhitespace = value;
164         return this;
165      }
166
167      // <FluentSetters>
168
169      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
170      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
171         super.apply(type, apply);
172         return this;
173      }
174
175      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
176      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
177         super.debug(value);
178         return this;
179      }
180
181      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
182      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
183         super.properties(value);
184         return this;
185      }
186
187      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
188      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
189         super.property(key, value);
190         return this;
191      }
192
193      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
194      public Builder unmodifiable() {
195         super.unmodifiable();
196         return this;
197      }
198
199      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
200      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
201         super.locale(value);
202         return this;
203      }
204
205      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
206      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
207         super.localeDefault(value);
208         return this;
209      }
210
211      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
212      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
213         super.mediaType(value);
214         return this;
215      }
216
217      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
218      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
219         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
220         return this;
221      }
222
223      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
224      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
225         super.timeZone(value);
226         return this;
227      }
228
229      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
230      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
231         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
232         return this;
233      }
234
235      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
236      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
237         super.javaMethod(value);
238         return this;
239      }
240
241      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
242      public Builder resolver(VarResolverSession value) {
243         super.resolver(value);
244         return this;
245      }
246
247      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
248      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
249         super.schema(value);
250         return this;
251      }
252
253      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
254      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
255         super.schemaDefault(value);
256         return this;
257      }
258
259      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
260      public Builder uriContext(UriContext value) {
261         super.uriContext(value);
262         return this;
263      }
264
265      // </FluentSetters>
266   }
267
268   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
269   // Instance
270   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
271
272   private final WriterSerializer ctx;
273   private final boolean useWhitespace;
274   private final Charset streamCharset, fileCharset;
275
276   /**
277    * Constructor.
278    *
279    * @param builder The builder for this object.
280    */
281   protected WriterSerializerSession(Builder builder) {
282      super(builder);
283      ctx = builder.ctx;
284      streamCharset = builder.streamCharset;
285      fileCharset = builder.fileCharset;
286      useWhitespace = builder.useWhitespace;
287   }
288
289   @Override /* SerializerSession */
290   public final boolean isWriterSerializer() {
291      return true;
292   }
293
294   @Override /* SerializerSession */
295   protected SerializerPipe createPipe(Object output) {
296      return new SerializerPipe(output, streamCharset, fileCharset);
297   }
298
299   /**
300    * Convenience method for serializing an object to a <c>String</c>.
301    *
302    * @param o The object to serialize.
303    * @return The output serialized to a string.
304    * @throws SerializeException If a problem occurred trying to convert the output.
305    */
306   @Override /* SerializerSession */
307   public final String serialize(Object o) throws SerializeException {
308      StringWriter w = new StringWriter();
309      try {
310         serialize(o, w);
311      } catch (IOException e) {
312         throw new SerializeException(e); // Shouldn't happen.
313      }
314      return w.toString();
315   }
316
317   @Override /* SerializerSession */
318   public final String serializeToString(Object o) throws SerializeException {
319      return serialize(o);
320   }
321
322   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
323   // Properties
324   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
325
326   /**
327    * Maximum indentation.
328    *
329    * @see WriterSerializer.Builder#maxIndent(int)
330    * @return
331    *    The maximum indentation level in the serialized document.
332    */
333   protected final int getMaxIndent() {
334      return ctx.getMaxIndent();
335   }
336
337   /**
338    * Quote character.
339    *
340    * @see WriterSerializer.Builder#quoteChar(char)
341    * @return
342    *    The character used for quoting attributes and values.
343    */
344   protected char getQuoteChar() {
345      return ctx.getQuoteChar();
346   }
347
348   /**
349    * Use whitespace.
350    *
351    * @see WriterSerializer.Builder#useWhitespace()
352    * @return
353    *    The character used for quoting attributes and values.
354    */
355   protected final boolean isUseWhitespace() {
356      return useWhitespace;
357   }
358
359   /**
360    * Returns the file charset defined on this session.
361    *
362    * @return the file charset defined on this session.
363    */
364   public Charset getFileCharset() {
365      return fileCharset;
366   }
367
368   /**
369    * Returns the stream charset defined on this session.
370    *
371    * @return the stream charset defined on this session.
372    */
373   public Charset getStreamCharset() {
374      return streamCharset;
375   }
376
377   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
378   // Other methods
379   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
380
381   @Override /* ContextSession */
382   protected JsonMap properties() {
383      return filteredMap("fileCharset", fileCharset, "streamCharset", streamCharset, "useWhitespace", useWhitespace);
384   }
385}
